api_list.api_description: Search for items using the Archive.org scraping API.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The query string using Lucene-like syntax.

optional_parameters.name: sorts
optional_parameters.description: Fields to sort results on, comma-delimited.

api_list.api_description: Get Carbon Intensity data for the current half hour.

query: I am researching the impact of technological advancements on carbon emissions. Can you find NASA-related items in the Archive.org collection and also provide the current carbon intensity data for Great Britain?

api_list.api_description: Retrieve metadata for an Archive.org item.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The identifier for the Archive.org item.

api_list.api_description: Get generation mix for the current half hour.

query: I recently heard about a specific document on Archive.org with a unique identifier, and I want to get its metadata. Additionally, I am interested in knowing the current electricity generation mix in Great Britain.
